rollupPreprocessor:
- kind: ethereum/contract
    name: IRollupCore
    network: {{ l1Network }}
    source:
      address: '{{ rollupAddress }}'
      abi: IRollupCore
      startBlock: {{ rollupDeploymentBlock }}
    mapping:
      kind: ethereum/events
      apiVersion: 0.0.6
      language: wasm/assemblyscript
      entities:
        - Node
      abis:
        - name: IRollupCore
          file: ./abis/IRollupCore.json
      eventHandlers:
        - event: NodeCreated(indexed uint256,indexed bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint256,bytes32,bytes32[3][2],uint256[4][2])
          handler: handleNodeCreated
        - event: NodeConfirmed(indexed uint256,bytes32,uint256,bytes32,uint256)
          handler: handleNodeConfirmed
        - event: NodeRejected(indexed uint256)
          handler: handleNodeRejected
      file: ./src/rollup.ts
